Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 63rd overall pick, by Penn in 1973...
Traded from Penn to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1975 (Going to PIL: P A. Kidwell, P S. Jean, P P. Mathis, P S. Delcastillo. Going to PEN: SS L. Chiodo)...
Earned first career win on 5/3/1980...
Injured on 5/18/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
